drupalNodeEvent.title: Panel Discussion: Overcoming Challenges in the Research Environment in China

field_speakers.processed:
Elizabeth Perry (Harvard University), Denise Ho (Yale University),
Robert Weller (Boston University), Yuen Yuen Ang (University of Michigan), Michael Szonyi (Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies at Harvard University)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: This panel discussion will focus on guidance and advice for late-stage graduate students who are experiencing challenges accessing archives, conducting interviews, or who otherwise face the types of barriers faced when conducting research in China but are now intensified by the COVID-19 pandemic.
